original_title: 八乃つばさ 麻薬捜査官 媚薬漬け膣痙攣
overview: Tsubasa, a special investigator who has been given various privileges due to his extraordinary ability. He steps into the drug trading scene of an organization that has been chasing his footsteps, but is overwhelmed by the enemy. Tsubasa resists his temper even though he is used as a laboratory table for pleasure medicines developed by the organization. Occasionally, I will make full use of color schemes and stand up to destroy the organization! The chokehold is clear!
title: Tsubasa Hachino. Narcotics Investigation Squad. Drugged With An Aphrodisiac, Twitching Pussy
